data.name: Boozy Dwarf
data.detailed_description:
Have you dreamed of being a dwarf?

The benefit of being a dwarf:
  • Luxury beard
  • The steel muscles
  • Axe!
  • Beer and ale! Lots of beer and ale!
  • Belching
  • The hating to elves
  • The most beautiful girls in the world (the whole thing in a beard)

If you're still in thought, then you eared elf and encourage you to pass!

Everyone else we strongly recommend to join the ranks of dwarves and embark on an adventure! (Immediately after a couple of mugs beer)

About the game

Classic fantasy RPG about dwarves
Non-linear storyline
Sandbox
Around 40 hours of gameplay

data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Greek*, Danish*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 256 MB VRAM or more that supports Shader Model 3 and DirectX 9.0c (AMD Radeon 2600 XT or NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium i5 Series or AMD X4 @ 2.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 6790 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or better with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: CPU that supports SSE2 (Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 256 MB VRAM or more that supports Shader Model 3 and DirectX 9.0c (NVIDIA GeForce 320m, Intel HD 3000)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Series @ 3.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 675mx or better with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 10

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/Nvidia
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64bit, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/Nvidia
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
